const response = await client.search({
  body: {
    query: {
      bool: {
        must: {
          term: {
            user: 'kimchy'
          }
        },
        filter: {
          term: {
            tag: 'tech'
          }
        },
        must_not: {
          range: {
            age: {
              gte: 10,
              lte: 20
            }
          }
        },
        should: [
          {
            term: {
              tag: 'wow'
            }
          },
          {
            term: {
              tag: 'elasticsearch'
            }
          }
        ],
        minimum_should_match: 1,
        boost: 1
      }
    }
  }
})
console.log(response)
